title: Remove "MyGallery" header text from home page top-left

requirements.summary: Remove the visible "MyGallery" header text next to the app icon by updating the existing Header component.
acceptanceCriteria: When viewing the home page header, the app icon remains visible but the "MyGallery" text is not displayed anywhere in the top-left header area.
No other UI elements, layout spacing (beyond removing the text itself), animations, routes, or app functionality are changed.

file_operations.description: Remove the <h1> element that renders the "MyGallery" text (currently in the top-left header area next to the AnimatedGalleryIcon), without changing any other markup, styling, spacing rules beyond the removal of the text node itself, or behavior.
